document_data.name: Flamesight Mosque
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.Description: This mosque was built to resemble a pyramid. The entire structure was made from [[copper]] that never tarnished.
document_data.Activities: The Flamesight Mosque was dedicated to [[Hastsezini]], who was also simply called "Fire." Since Hastezini was a hungry god who demanded sacrifice, the [[Noble efreeti|noble efreet]] kept him satiated with rich offerings. Most of the public burnings carried out in the City of Brass were performed at the base of the Flamesight Mosque.
document_data.Inhabitants: The priesthood of Hastezini was small. Similar to the god they venerated, they were vengeful and arrogant.
